question: What are the steps to save a file in MS Office?
option1: File menu -> Save -> SaveDialogBox -> Select desired location to save -> Name the file -> Save the file
option2: Ctrl+S -> SaveDialogBox -> Select desired location to save -> Name the file -> Save the file
option3: Ctrl+W -> MessageBox -> Save -> SaveDialogBox -> Select desired location to save -> Name the file -> Save the file
